feature.label: EPackage registrationFeature
feature.description: This set of plugins offers to dynamically register EPackages from ecore files. This allows to be able to load conforming models without having to physically generate the bytecode and deploy it in another eclipse runtime. It also proposes a view showing all registered EPackages and their origin.
